settings.heading: Pure Power High Output Alternator Warranty Information

settings.title: Quality Assurance and Testing
settings.text: Every Pure Power alternator is rigorously tested to meet or exceed our stringent amperage output specifications. You will receive individual test results, providing evidence of the endurance and performance on the day and time of testing. Choose Pure Power for an unmatched combination of quality, value, and service.

settings.title: Dedicated to Customer Satisfaction
settings.text: At Pure Power, your satisfaction is our priority. We are committed to delivering the best in alternator technology, alternator warranty, and customer service. For any questions or assistance, our customer support team is here to support you. Please Note: Our alternator warranty information is subject to change. Always refer to the latest policy details on our website.

settings.heading: Pure Power Alternator Warranty: 24-Month & Lifetime Repair Options

settings.text: Our Pure Power Series alternators are covered by a limited 24-month warranty with an option to extend to a lifetime limited warranty. This warranty entitles you to return the alternator for repair service within the respective warranty period from the original purchase date.

settings.title: Warranty Coverages
settings.text:
• Defects due to failed parts or workmanship will be repaired and the alternator returned.
  • Damage due to misuse or customer handling may incur repair costs.
  • No refunds are issued for warranty claims.

settings.title: Disclaimer & Exclusions
settings.text:
• This warranty does not apply to alternators installed in vehicles used for commercial or racing purposes.
  • Alternators damaged by overcharging or subjected to contamination and improper installation are not covered.
  • The warranty is void if the alternator is modified, misused, abused, or improperly installed.

settings.title: Customer Responsibilities
settings.text:
• Shipping costs to the repair facility are the responsibility of the customer.
  • Return shipping within the continental U.S. 48 states is covered by Pure Power.
